channel.title: The Daily Journal Podcast
channel.description: Kankakee County's leading newspaper in Illinois. Listen to what's happening from one of the fastest growing counties located in the Southern Chicago area!
channel.itunes:author: Daily Journal
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Official Podcast of the Daily Journal
channel.itunes:summary: Kankakee County's leading newspaper in Illinois. Listen to what's happening from one of the fastest growing counties located in the Southern Chicago area!
channel.itunes:keywords: newspaper, Kankakee, Bradley, Bourbonnais, Herscher, Manteno, St. Anne, Momence, Chebanse, Limestone, Illinois, news, journalism, Podsafe, Podsafe Music, family, garageband

item.title: Today's Daily Journal Podcast - Tuesday 07/17/07
item.description: July 17, 2007 Episode #179 Mark Thomsen, who will sing the role of Alfredo in the Aug. 3 and 5 production of "La Traviata" in Watseka, talks about his travels to China, recording on vinyl and being suddenly promoted from understudy to sing lead on opening night at the Lyric Opera in Chicago in 2005.

item.title: Today's Daily Journal Podcast - Sunday 09/02/07
item.description:
September 2, 2007 Episode #180
Working for Minimum Wage

item.title: Today's Daily Journal Podcast - Friday 10/12/07
item.description: October 12, 2007 Episode #181 Jennifer Schneider sings Mozart's Exsultate, jubilate" at Kankakee's Asbury United Methodist Church in October 2005. Thanks to Tom W. Elroy of T-Soft Computers for converting the home video to audio for the Web.
